item.title: ‘She’s kept him afloat’: I’m 78 and leaving my daughter, 41, my life savings, but her partner is a mooch. How can I protect her?
item.description: “He keeps losing jobs and going on unemployment.”

item.title: As gold prices soar, this billionaire investor now has a big stake in an Alaskan gold mine
item.description: Billionaire investor John Paulson is teaming up with Canada’s NovaGold to purchase a stake in an Alaskan gold mine.

item.title: Worried your Social Security benefits are wrong? Here’s what to do now.
item.description: The Social Security Administration can withhold 100% of a person’s check to repay the debt

item.title: Lockheed Martin affirms outlook but doesn’t include tariff impact, and its stock falls
item.description: Lockheed beat profit expectations by a wide margin and said its $173 billion backlog represents more than two years’ worth of sales.

item.title: New research links golf with living longer. These golfers still swinging in their 70s agree.
item.description: The sport has a growing number of senior participants — and there’s new research that says playing the game is a longevity booster.
